arabicText: سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍۢ وَاقِعٍۢ ١
englishTranslationText: A	requester	seeks	the	punishment	that	will	take	place	-
romanUrduTranslationText: Ek	māñgne	wāla	woh	‘aƶāb		māngta	hai.

arabicText: لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌۭ
englishTranslationText: Upon	the	disbelievers	–	the	punishment	that	none	can	avert
romanUrduTranslationText: Jo	kāfiroñ		par	hone	wāla	hai	uska	koi	tālne	wāla	nahi

arabicText: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ
englishTranslationText: From	Allah,	the	Lord	of	all	pinnacles.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	hoga	Allah	ki	taraf	se	jo	bulandiyoñ	ka	mālik	hai

arabicText: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍۢ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	angels	and	Jibreel,	ascend	towards	Him	–	the	punishment	will	befall	on	a	day	which	spans	
fifty	thousand	years.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Malāika	aur	jibreel	uski	bargāh	ki	taraf	urooj	karte	haiñ	woh	‘aƶāb		us	din	hoga	jiski	miqdār	
pachās hazār	baras	hai

arabicText: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًۭا جَمِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	patiently	endure,	in	the	best	manner	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him).
romanUrduTranslationText: To	tum	achchhi	tarah	sabr	karo.

arabicText: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText: They	deem	it	to	be	remote.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	usey	door	samajh	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًۭا
englishTranslationText: Whereas	We	see	it	impending.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	ham	usey	nazdeek	dekh	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ
englishTranslationText: The	day	when	the	sky	will	be	like	molten	silver.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	āasmān	hoga	jaisi	gali chāñdi

arabicText: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ
englishTranslationText: And	the	hills	will	be	light	as	wool.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pahād	aise	halke	ho	jāyeñ	ge	jaise	oon

arabicText: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText: And	no	friend	will	ask	concerning	his	friend.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	koi	dost	kisi	dost	ki	bāt	na	poochhe	ga.

arabicText: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	be	seeing	them;	the	guilty	will	
wish	if	only	he	could	redeem	himself	from	
the	punishment	of	that	day,	by	offering	his	
sons.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hoñge	unheiñ	dekhte	huwe	mujrim	ārzu	
kare	ga	kāsh	is	din	ke	‘aƶāb	se	chutne	ke	
badle	meiñ	de	de	apne	bete

arabicText: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ
englishTranslationText: And	his	wife	and	his	brother.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apni	joru	aur	apna	bhai.

arabicText: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ
englishTranslationText: And	the	family	in	which	he	was.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apna	kumba	jis	meiñ	uski	jagah	hai.

arabicText: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
englishTranslationText:
And	all	those	who	are	in	the	earth	-	then	
only	if	the	redemption	saves	him!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jitne	zameen	meiñ	haiñ	sab	phir	yeh	
badla	dena	usey	bacha	le.

arabicText: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
englishTranslationText: Never!	That	is	indeed	a	blazing	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText: Hargiz	nahi	woh	to	bhadakti	āag		hai

arabicText: نَزَّاعَةًۭ لِّلشَّوَىٰ
englishTranslationText: A	fire	that	melts	the	hide.
romanUrduTranslationText: Khāl	utārne	wāli	bula	rahi	hai

arabicText: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
englishTranslationText:
It	calls	out	to	him	who	reverted	and	turned	
away.
romanUrduTranslationText: Usko	jis	ne	peeth	di	aur	moñh	phera

arabicText: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText: And	accumulated	wealth	and	hoarded	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jod	kar	saiñ’t	(Mahfooz	kar)	rakha

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	man	is	created	very	impatient,	
greedy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	āadmi	banāya	gaya	hai	badā	be
sabra	harees

arabicText: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Very	nervous	when	touched	by	
misfortune.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	usey	burāyi	pahuñche	to	sakht	
ghabrāne	wāla.

arabicText: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
englishTranslationText: And	refraining,	when	good	reaches	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	bhalāyi	pahuñche	to	rok	rakhne	
wāla

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
englishTranslationText: Except	those	who	establish	prayer.
romanUrduTranslationText: Magar	Namāzi

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ
englishTranslationText: Those	who	are	regular	in	their	prayers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jo	apni	Namāz	ke	paband	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	in	whose	wealth	exists	a	
recognised	right,
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jinke	māl	meiñ	ek	m’aloom	haq	
hai

arabicText: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
englishTranslationText:
For	those	who	ask,	and	for	the	needy	who	
cannot	even	ask.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uske	liye	jo	māñge	aur	jo	māñg	bhi	na	sake	
to	mehroom	rahe

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	believe	the	Day	of	
Judgement	to	be	true.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	insāf	ka	din	sach jānte	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	who	fear	the	punishment	of	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	apne	Rab	ke	‘aƶāb		se	dar	rahe	
haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍۢ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	the	punishment	of	their	Lord	is	not	a	thing	to	be	unafraid	of!
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	unke	Rab	ka	‘aƶāb	nidar hone	ki	cheez	nahi

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	who	protect	their	private	organs	(from	adultery).
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	apni	sharam-gāhon	ki	hifazat	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Except	with	their	wives	and	the	bondwomen	in	their	possession,	for	there	is	no	reproach	on	
them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Magar	apni	bibiyoñ	ya	apne	hāth	ke	māl	kaneezoñ	se	ke	in	par	kuchh	malāmat	nahi.

arabicText: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
englishTranslationText: So	those	who	desire	more	than	this	–	it	is	they	who	are	the	transgressors.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	jo	in	do	ke	siwa	aur	chāhe	wohi	had	se	badhne	wāle	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	who	protect	the	property	entrusted	to	them,	and	their	agreements
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	apni	amānatoñ	aur	apne	ahed	ki	hifazat	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَـٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	who	are	firm	upon	their	testimonies.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	apni	gawahiyoñ	par	qāim	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	those	who	protect	their	prayers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	apni	namāz	ki	hifazat	karte	haiñ

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍۢ مُّكْرَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: It	is	these	who	will	be	honoured	in	Gardens
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	haiñ	jinka	bāghoñ	meiñ	e’izāz	hoga

arabicText: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
englishTranslationText: So	what	is	the	matter	with	these	disbelievers,	that	they	stare	at	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	un	kāfiroñ		ko	kya	huwa	tumhāri	taraf	tez	nigah	se	dekhte	haiñ

arabicText: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
englishTranslationText: From	the	right	and	the	left,	in	groups?
romanUrduTranslationText: Dehne	aur	bayeñ	giroh	ke	giroh

arabicText: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText: Does	every	man	among	them	aspire	to	be	admitted	into	the	Garden	of	serenity?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	un	meiñ	har	shakhs	yeh	tamanna	karta	hai	ke	chain	ke	bāgh	meiñ	dākhil	kiya	jāye.

arabicText: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: Never!	We	have	indeed	created	them	from	a	thing	they	know.
romanUrduTranslationText: Hargiz	nahi	be-shak		ham	ne	unheiñ	us	cheez	se	banāya	jise	jānte	haiñ.

arabicText: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	I	swear	by	the	Lord	of	every	East	and	
every	West,	that	We	are	indeed	Able.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	mujhe	qasam	hai	uski	jo	sab	pooraboñ	
sab	pachchimoñ	ka	mālik	hai	ke	zaroor	
ham	qādir	haiñ.

arabicText: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
To	replace	them	by	those	better	than	
them;	and	none	can	escape	from	Us.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	un	se	achchhe	bādal	deiñ	aur	ham	se	koi	
nikal	kar	nahi	ja	sakta

arabicText: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	leave	them,	involved	in	their	
indecencies	and	play,	till	they	confront	
their	day	which	they	are	promised.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unheiñ	chhod	do	unki	behoodgiyoñ	
meiñ	pade	aur	khelte	huwe	yahāñ		tak	ke	
apne	us	din	se	mileiñ	jiska	unheiñ	w’ada	
diya	jāta	hai.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًۭا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍۢ يُوفِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
A	day	when	they	will	come	out	of	the	
graves	in	haste,	as	if	rushing	towards	their	
goals.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	qabroñ	se	nikleñge	jhapat-te	huwe	
goya	woh	nishānoñ	ki	taraf		lapak	rahe	
haiñ

arabicText: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
With	lowered	eyes,	disgrace	overcoming	
them;	this	is	the	day,	which	they	had	been	
promised.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āñkheiñ		neechi	kiye	huwe	un	par	zillat	
sawār	yeh	hai	unka	woh	din	jiska	un	se	
w’ada	tha.

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	We	sent	Nooh	towards	his	people	
saying	that,	“Warn	your	people	before	the	
painful	punishment	comes	upon	them.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		ham	ne	Nūh	ko	uski	qaum	ki	taraf		
bheja	ke	unko	darā	is	se	pehle	ke	un	par	
dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		āaye

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“O	my	people!	I	am	indeed	a	
Herald	of	clear	warnings	to	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	ne	farmāya	aey	meri	qaum!	Maiñ	
tumhāre	liye	sareeh	dar	sunāne	wāla	hooñ

arabicText: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
englishTranslationText:
“That	you	must	worship	Allah	and	fear	
Him,	and	obey	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	Allah	ki	bandagi	karo	aur	us	se	daro	aur	
mera	ḥukm		māno.

arabicText: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“He	will	forgive	you	some	of	your	sins,	and	
give	you	respite	up	to	an	appointed	term;	
indeed	the	promise	of	Allah	cannot	be	
averted	when	it	arrives;	if	only	you	knew.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	tumhāre	kuch	gunah	bakhsh	dega	aur	ek	muqarrar	me'ād	tak	tumheiñ		mohlat	dega	be-shak		
Allah	ka	w’ada		jab	āata	hai	hatāya	nahi	jāta	kisi	tarah	tum	jānte

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًۭا وَنَهَارًۭا
englishTranslationText: He	said,	“My	Lord!	I	invited	my	people	night	and	day.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Árz	ki	aey	mere	Rab!	Maiñ	ne	apni	qaum	ko	rāt	din	bulāya

arabicText: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًۭا
englishTranslationText: “So	for	them,	my	calling	them	only	increased	their	fleeing	away.”
romanUrduTranslationText: To	mere	bulāne	se	unheiñ	bhāgna	hi	badha

arabicText: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“And	whenever	I	called	them,	so	that	You	may	forgive	them,	they	always	thrust	their	fingers	into	
their	ears,	and	covered	themselves	with	their	clothes,	and	remained	stubborn	and	were	
extremely	haughty.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	maiñ	ne	jitni	bār	unheiñ	bulāya	ke	tu	unko	bakhshe	unhoñ	ne	apne	kānoñ	meiñ	ungliyañ	de	liñ	
aur	apne	kapde	odh	liye	aur	hat	(Zid)	ki	aur	badā	ghuroor	kiya

arabicText: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًۭا
englishTranslationText: “I	then	called	them	openly.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	maiñ	ne	unheiñ	e’alāniya	bulāya

arabicText: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًۭا
englishTranslationText: “Then	I	also	told	them	publicly	and	also	spoke	to	them	softly	in	private.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	maiñ	ne	unse	ba	e’alān	bhi	kahā	aur	āahista	khufya	bhi	kahā

arabicText: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًۭا
englishTranslationText: “I	therefore	told	them,	‘Seek	forgiveness	from	your	Lord;	He	is	indeed	Most	Forgiving.’
romanUrduTranslationText: To	maiñ	ne	kahā	apne	Rab	se	mu'āfi	māñgo	be-shak	woh	bada	mu'āf	farmāne	wāla	hai

arabicText: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘He	will	send	down	abundant	rain	for	you	
from	the	sky.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	par	sharrāte	ka	meñh	(Mooslā	dhār	
Barish)	bhejega.

arabicText: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍۢ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	will	aid	you	with	wealth	and	sons,	and	
will	create	gardens	for	you	and	cause	
rivers	to	flow	for	you.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	māl	aur	betoñ	se	tumhāri	madad	
karega	aur	tumhāre	liye	bāgh	banā	dega	
aur	tumhāre	liye	nehreiñ		banaye	ga

arabicText: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘What	is	the	matter	with	you,	that	you	do	
not	desire	honour	from	Allah?’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumheiñ		kya	huwa	Allah	se	‘izzat	hāsil	
karne	ki	ummeed	nahi	karte

arabicText: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
englishTranslationText:
‘Whereas	it	is	He	Who	created	you	in	
different	stages?’
romanUrduTranslationText: Halānke	usne	tumheiñ		tarah tarah	banāya

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ طِبَاقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘Do	you	not	see	how	Allah	has	created	the	
seven	heavens	atop	each	other?’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	nahi	dekhte	Allah	ne	kyuñ-kar	sāt	
āasmān	banāye	ek	par	ek.

arabicText: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	in	them,	has	illuminated	the	moon,	
and	made	the	sun	a	lamp?’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	chāñnd	ko	raushni	kiya	aur	
sooraj	ko	chiragh

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	it	is	Allah	Who	made	you	grow	like	
vegetation	from	the	earth.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ne	tumheiñ	sabze	ki	tarah	
zameen	se	ugāya

arabicText: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	He	will	then	take	you	back	to	it,	and	
again	remove	you	from	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	tumheiñ	usi	meiñ	le	jāyega	aur	dobāra	
nikāle	ga

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	it	is	Allah	Who	made	the	earth	a	bed	
for	you.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ne	tumhāre	liye zameen	ko	
bichauna	banaya.

arabicText: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًۭا فِجَاجًۭا
englishTranslationText: ‘So	that	you	may	tread	the	wide	roads	in	it.’
romanUrduTranslationText: Ke	iske	wasee’	rāston	meiñ	chalo

arabicText: قَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Prayed	Nooh,	“O	my	Lord!	They	have	
disobeyed	me,	and	they	follow	the	one	
whose	wealth	and	children	increase	
nothing	for	him	except	ruin.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Nūh	ne	‘arz	ki	aey	mere	Rab!	Inhoñ	ne	
meri	na	farmāni	ki	aur	aise	ke	peechhe	ho	
liye	jise	uske	māl	aur	aulād	ne	nuqsān	hi	
badhaya

arabicText: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا كُبَّارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“And	they	carried	out	a	very	sinister	
scheme.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	bahut	bada	da'oñ	khele

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّۭا وَلَا سُوَاعًۭا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“And	they	said,	‘Do	not	ever	abandon	your	Gods	–	and	never	abandon	Wadd,	or	Suwa	-	or	Yaghuth	
or	Yauq	or	Nasr.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	hargiz	na	chordna	apne	khudaoñ	
ko	aur	hargiz	na	chordna	Wadd	aur	na	
Suwa'a	aur	Yaghoos	aur	Ya'ooq	aur	Nasr	ko

arabicText: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“And	they	have	misled	a	large	number;	and	(I	pray	that)	You	increase	nothing	for	the	unjust	
except	error.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	unhoñ	ne	bahutoñ	ko	behkāya	aur	tu	Ƶālimoñ	ko	ziyada	na	karna	magar	gumrāhi

arabicText: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًۭا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Because	of	their	sins	they	were	drowned	and	then	put	into	the	fire;	so	they	did	not	find	any	
supporter	for	themselves	against	Allah.	(Punishment	in	the	grave	is	proven	by	this	verse.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Apni	kaisi	khatāoñ	par	duboye	gaye	phir	āag		meiñ	dākhil	kiye	gaye	to	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ke	muqabil	
apna	koi	madad-gār	na	pāya

arabicText: وَقَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
englishTranslationText: And	prayed	Nooh,	“O	my	Lord!	Do	not	leave	any	of	the	disbelievers	dwelling	in	the	land.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Nūh	ne	‘arz	ki	aey	mere	Rab!	zameen	par	kāfiroñ		meiñ	se	koi	basne	wāla	na	chhod

arabicText: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًۭا كَفَّارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed,	if	You	spare	them,	they	will	mislead	your	bondmen	-	and	their	descendants,	if	any,	will	
be	none	except	the	wicked,	very	ungrateful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		agar	tu	unheiñ	rehne	dega	to	tere	bandoñ	ko	gumrah	kar	deñge	aur	inke	aulād	hogi	to	
woh	bhi	na	hogi	magar	bad-kār	badi	na-shukr

arabicText: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًۭا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
englishTranslationText:
“O	my	Lord!	Forgive	me,	and	my	parents,	and	the	believers	who	are	in	my	house,	and	all	other	
Muslim	men	and	Muslim	women;	and	do	not	increase	anything	for	the	unjust	except	ruin.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	mere	Rab!	Mujhe	bakhsh	de	aur	mere	mā	bāp	ko	aur	usey	jo	Imān	ke	sāth	mere	ghar	meiñ	
hai	aur	sab	Musalman	mardoñ	aur	sab	Musalman	aurtoñ	ko	aur	kāfiroñ	ko	na	badha	magar	tabāhi

arabicText: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	have	
received	the	divine	revelation	that	some	
jinns	attentively	listened	to	my	recitation,	
so	they	said,	‘We	have	heard	a	unique	
Qur’an.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	mujhe	waḥi	huyi	ke	kuchh	
jinnoñne	mera	padhna	kān	lagākar	suna	to	
bole	ham	ne	ek	ajeeb	Qur’ān	suna

arabicText: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘That	guides	to	the	path	of	goodness,	we	
have	therefore	accepted	faith	in	it;	and	we	
shall	never	ascribe	anyone	as	a	partner	to	
our	Lord.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	bhalāi	ki	rāh	batāta	hai	to	ham	us	par	
imān	lāye	aur	ham	hargiz	kisi	ko	apne	Rab	
ka	shreek	na	karenge

arabicText: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةًۭ وَلَا وَلَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	our	Lord’s	Majesty	is	Supreme	-	
He	has	neither	chosen	a	wife	nor	a	child.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	hamāre	Rab	ki	shān	bahut	
buland	hai	na	usne	aurat	ikhtiyār	ki	aur	na	
bachcha

arabicText: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	the	fool	among	us	used	to	utter	
false	exaggerations	against	Allah.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	meiñ	ka	bewaqoof	Allah	par	
badh	kar	bāt	kehta	tha

arabicText: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘Whereas	we	thought	that	men	and	jinns	
would	never	fabricate	a	lie	against	Allah!’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	hameiñ	khayāl	tha	ke	hargiz	
āadmi	aur	jinn	Allah	par	jhoot	na	bāñdheñ	
ge

arabicText: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	indeed	some	men	among	humans	used	
to	take	the	protection	of	some	men	among	
jinns,	so	it	further	increased	their	
haughtiness.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ādmiyoñ	meiñ	ke	kuchh	mard,	
jinoñ	ke	kuchh	mardoñ	ki	panah	lete	they	to	
is	se	aur	bhi	unka	takabbur	badha.

arabicText: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	they	assumed,	like	you	humans	
assume,	that	Allah	would	not	send	any	
Noble	Messenger.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	unhoñ	ne	gumān	kiya	jaisa	
tumheiñ	gumān	hai	ke	Allah	hargiz	koi	
Rasool	na	bheje	ga.

arabicText: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًۭا شَدِيدًۭا وَشُهُبًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	we	reached	the	sky,	so	we	found	it	
strongly	guarded	and	filled	with	comets.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	ne	āasmān	ko	choowa	to	
usey	pāya	ke	sakht	pehre	aur	āag		ki	
chingāriyoñ	se	bhar	diya	gaya	hai

arabicText: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًۭا رَّصَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	we	sometimes	used	to	sit	in	some	places	in	the	sky,	to	listen;	so	whoever	now	listens	
finds	a	fiery	comet	waiting	for	him.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	pehle	āasmān	meiñ	sunne	
ke	liye	kuchh	mauqoñ	par	baitha	karte	they	
phir	ab	jo	koi	sune	woh	apni	tāk	meiñ	āag		
ka	looka	(Lapat)	pāaye.

arabicText: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	we	do	not	know	whether	harm	is	intended	for	those	on	the	earth,	or	whether	their	Lord	
intends	goodness	for	them.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	hameiñ	nahi	m’aloom	ke	zameen	waloñ		se	koi	burāyi	ka	irāda	farmāya	gaya	hai	ya	
unke	Rab	ne	koyi	bhalāi	chāhi	hai.

arabicText: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًۭا
englishTranslationText: ‘And	among	us	some	are	virtuous	and	some	are	the	other	type;	we	are	split	into	several	branches.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	meiñ	kuch	nek	haiñ	aur	kuch	doosri	tarah	ke	haiñ	ham	kayi	rāheiñ	phate	huwe	
haiñ

arabicText: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًۭا
englishTranslationText: ‘And	we	are	certain	that	we	cannot	defeat	Allah	in	the	earth,	nor	can	we	run	out	of	His	grasp.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	ko	yaqeen	huwa	ke	hargiz	zameen	meiñ	Allah	ke	qābu	se	na	nikal	sakeñ	ge	aur	
na	bhāg	kar	uske	qabze	se	bāhar	hoñ.

arabicText: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًۭا وَلَا رَهَقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	when	we	heard	the	guidance,	we	accepted	faith	in	it;	so	whoever	accepts	faith	in	his	
Lord,	has	no	fear	-	neither	of	any	loss	nor	of	any	injustice.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	ne	jab	hidāyat	suni	us	par	imān	lāye	to	jo	apne	Rab	par	imān	lāye	usey	na	kisi	
kami	ka	khauf	na	ziyādati	ka

arabicText: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	some	among	us	are	Muslims	and	
some	are	the	unjust;	and	whoever	has	
accepted	Islam	–	it	is	they	who	have	
thought	rightly.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	ham	meiñ	kuchh	Musalman	
haiñ	aur	kuchh	Ƶālim	to	jo	Islam	lāye	
unhoñ	ne	bhalāyi	sochi

arabicText: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	as	for	the	unjust	-	they	are	the	fuel	of	
hell.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	rahe	Ƶālim	woh	Jahannam	ke	eñdhan	
huwe

arabicText: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	have	
received	the	divine	revelation	that	‘Had	
they	remained	upright	on	the	straight	
path,	We	would	have	given	them	abundant	
water.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	farmāo	ke	mujhe	yeh	waḥi	huyi	hai	ke	
agar	woh	rāh	par	seedhe	rehte	to	zaroor	
ham	unheiñ	wāfir	pāni	dete

arabicText: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًۭا صَعَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘In	order	to	test	them	with	it;	and	whoever	
turns	away	from	the	remembrance	of	his	
Lord	–	He	will	put	him	in	a	punishment	that	
keeps	on	increasing.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	is	par	unheiñ	jāñche	aur	jo	apne	Rab	ki	
yād	se	moñh	phere	woh	usey	chadhte	‘aƶāb		
meiñ	dāle	ga

arabicText: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	the	masjids	are	for	Allah	only	–	
therefore	do	not	worship	anyone	along	
with	Allah.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	masjideiñ	Allah	hi	ki	haiñ	to	
Allah	ke	sāth	kisi	ki	bandagi	na	karo

arabicText: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
‘And	that	when	Allah’s	bondman	stood	up	
to	worship	Him,	the	jinns	had	almost	
crowded	upon	him.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	jab	Allah	ka	banda	uski	bandagi	
karne	khadā	huwa	to	qareeb	tha	ke	woh	
jinn	us	par	thath	ke	thath	ho	jāyeñ

arabicText: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	worship	only	
Allah,	and	I	do	not	ascribe	any	partner	to	
Him.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	maiñ	to	apne	Rab	hi	ki	
bandagi	karta	hooñ	aur	kisi	ko	uska	
shareek	nahi	thehrāta.

arabicText: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا رَشَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	am	not	the	master	of	any	harm	or	benefit	for	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		maiñ	tumhāre	kisi	bure	bhale	
ka	mālik	nahi.

arabicText: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌۭ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
englishTranslationText: Say,	“No	one	will	ever	save	me	from	Allah,	and	other	than	Him,	I	will	not	find	any	refuge.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	hargiz	mujhe	Allah	se	koi	na	
bachāye	ga	aur	hargiz	uske	siwa	koi	panāh	
na	pāoñ	ga.

arabicText: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
englishTranslationText:
“I	only	convey	the	commands	from	Allah,	and	His	messages;	and	whoever	disobeys	the	
commands	of	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger	–	then	indeed	for	him	is	the	fire	of	hell,	in	which	
they	will	remain	for	ever	and	ever.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	Allah	ke	payām	pahuñchāna	aur	
uski	Risālateiñ	aur	jo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	
ka	ḥukm	na	māne	to	be-shak	unke	liye	
Jahannam	ki	āag		hai	jis	meiñ	hamesha	hamesha	raheiñ
